title: HPE security advisory (AV26-139)
description: On February 17, 2026, HPE published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following product:
products: HPE Aruba Networking ClearPass Policy Manager 6.12.x  version 6.12.7 and prior
HPE Aruba Networking ClearPass Policy Manager 6.11.x  version 6.11.13 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
